```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

```


# DATA

```{r}

palmer <- read.csv("All PRE_Reduction.csv")

str(palmer)

palmer$run <- as.factor(palmer$run)

palmer$pop <- as.factor(palmer$pop)

palmer$herb <- as.factor(palmer$herb)

palmer$rate <- as.factor(palmer$rate)

palmer$rep <- as.factor(palmer$rep)

str(palmer)

```


# DATA SUMMARY

```{r}

summary <- palmer %>% 
  group_by(herb,rate) %>% 
  summarise(n = sum(!is.na(count_red)), 
            mean = mean(count_red, na.rm = TRUE), 
            sd = sd(count_red, na.rm = TRUE),
            se = sd / sqrt(n),
            CI = qnorm(1- 0.05/2) * se)

summary
            
```


# PLOT

```{r}

ggplot(summary, aes(x = mean*100, y = reorder(herb, mean))) + 
  geom_point(size = 2) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = 90, size = 1, colour = "red") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(xmin = (mean*100) - (se*100), xmax = (mean*100) + (se*100), width = 0.2)) + 
  facet_grid(rate ~ ., labeller = label_both) +
  labs(title = "Palmer Count Reduction - PRE", x = "Count Reduction (%)", y = "Herbicide") + 
  theme_classic() + 
  theme (plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", hjust = 0.5, size = 20, colour = "darkgreen"), 
         axis.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 18, colour = "darkgreen"), 
         axis.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12, colour = "black"),
         strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12, colour = "black")) +
  ggsave("RAW COUNTRED_HERBxRATE.jpeg", units="in", width=8, height=5, dpi=600)

```
